member.name: INameSpaceTreeControlEvents.OnAfterContextMenu
member.summary: Called after a context menu is displayed.
member.param: A pointer to the from which the context menu is generated. This value can be NULL only if the flag is set.
A pointer to the context menu.
Reference to the IID of the context menu.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the interface specified in riid.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INameSpaceTreeControlEvents.OnAfterExpand
member.param: A pointer to the that was expanded.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INameSpaceTreeControlEvents.OnBeforeContextMenu

Reference to the IID of the context menu.
When this methods returns, contains the address of a pointer to the interface specified by riid.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INameSpaceTreeControlEvents.OnBeforeExpand

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INameSpaceTreeControlEvents.OnItemClick
member.summary: Called when the user clicks a button on the mouse.
member.param: The that was clicked.

param.name: nstceHitTest
param.para: The location on the that was clicked. One of the following values:
The click was on the icon of the .
The click was on the label text of the .
The click was on the indented space on the leftmost side of the .
The click was on the expando button of the .
The click was on the rightmost side of the text of the .
The click was on the state icon of the .
The click was on the item icon or the item label or the state icon of the .
The click was on the tab button of the .

param.name: nstceClickType
param.para: Indicates which button was clicked and the kind of click. One of the following values:
The click was a double click. If this value is present, it is added to one of the other values.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
